1.0.0.name: wordpress/fashion-traffic
1.0.0.description:
The Fashion Traffic plugin for WordPress is an extension of the Fashion Traffic website that enables you to search Fashion Traffic's inventory of affiliated fashion products from the "Add New Post" page in your WordPress blog's admin console so you can add product names, pictures linkes quickly and easily to your blog.

Monetize your Fashion and Style Blog(s)

Fashion Traffic makes it easy for you to add affiliate links for smart new fashion products from all popular styles so be sure to read about how Fashion Traffic lets bloggers use it's beautiful fashion photos for free, and you get paid to do it!

Learn More

In case this is the first time you've heard about Fashion Traffic and it's still not clear how Fashion Traffic can help you, here's a short video to give you
